attributes.action: Make Airports Exempt from the smoking ban
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As you can't smoke on aircraft these days, it's harsh to force smokers not to smoke in an airport, given that they maybe about to board a long-haul flight. The government should either make airports exempt from the ban, or, allow the airports to provide ventilated designated smoking areas

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
